articles.description: This thriller about washed-up spies is certainly tense, but it feels like we’ve seen the Tinker Tailor actor – and co-star Kristin Scott Thomas – play these roles before
articles.content:
The suspect is carrying a suspicious backpack towards a plane loaded with fuel and filling up with passengers. Destination? Marrakech.
Suspect? Male. Age? 20s. Appearance? Asian. Racial profiling? C… [+4533 chars]
